alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; Inland Bay; Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 6:08PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT JACKSON...NORTHERN BAY... NORTHWESTERN CALHOUN...SOUTHEASTERN WALTON...EASTERN HOLMES... WASHINGTON COUNTIES IN THE PANHANDLE OF FLORIDA AND WESTERN SEMINOLE COUNTIES IN SOUTHWESTERN GEORGIA THROUGH 700 PM EST/600 PM CST/... At 607 PM EST/507 PM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Graceville to near Chipley to 12 miles northwest of Panama City Beach. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Chipley, Graceville, Bonifay, Marianna, Bradford, Malone, Sneads, Cottondale, Grand Ridge, Greenwood, Altha, Alford, Wausau, Ebro, Campbellton, Noma, Bascom, Moose Pond, and Camps Head. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; Inland Bay; Jackson; Washington
